title: Ep. 150 - Primitives Protected Their Border. Why Can't We?
description:
The people who say the Sentinelese did nothing wrong when they brutally murdered a man for stepping onto their island are the same ones who complain that our government is evil for using non-lethal means against people who illegally invade our country. Isn't this inconsistent? And isn't it racist to expect so little of primitive tribes while expecting so much of white western nations?
